headline: Palantir, The Newest S&P 500 Stock, Is Leaving Nvidia In The Dust
summary: Palantir joined the S&P 500 in September. It's now the index's top performer in 2024, passing Nvidia and Vistra.

headline: Woodward Signs Agreement to Divest Its Heavy Duty Gas Turbines Combustion Parts Business Based in Greenville, S.C., to GE Vernova
summary: FORT COLLINS, Colo., Nov. 18, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Woodward (NASDAQ: WWD), a leader in aerospace and industrial energy control solutions, today announced that it has signed a definitive agreement under which GE Vernova (NYSE: GEV) is to acquire Woodward’s heavy duty gas turbines combustion parts business based in Greenville, S.C. Under the terms of the agreement and subject to meeting all closing terms and conditions, GE Vernova will acquire assets related to the business that are dedicated
